TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit BitVector32 extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Provides a simple structure that stores Boolean values and small integers in 32 bits of memory.

span.span: Provides a simple structure that stores Boolean values and small integers in 32 bits of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比效率更高的布尔值和小整数内部使用。 is more efficient than for Boolean values and small integers that are used internally. A可以根据需要无限期地增长，但它具有的类实例需要的内存和性能开销。A can grow indefinitely as needed, but it has the memory and performance overhead that a class instance requires. 与此相反，只使用 32 位。In contrast, a uses only 32 bits. A可以设置结构，以包含小整数的各节或位标志的布尔值，但不是能同时。A structure can be set up to contain either sections for small integers or bit flags for Booleans, but not both. A是一个窗口，到并由组成最少数量的可以包含在指定的最大值的连续位。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，包含的最大值为 1 的部分由组成仅一位，而包含的最大值为 5 的部分组成的三个位数。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建最大值为 1，以充当一个布尔值，从而使您能够将整数和布尔值存储在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 可以使用某些成员设置为节，尽管其他成员可以使用一个设置为位标志。Some members can be used for a that is set up as sections, while other members can be used for one that is set up as bit flags. 例如，属性是索引器作为部分中，设置和属性是索引器为位标志设置。For example, the property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. 创建一系列可以用于访问中的单个位掩码为位标志设置。 creates a series of masks that can be used to access individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags. 在使用掩码设置为部分可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用作为位标志的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of bit flags. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CPP/bitvector32_bitflags.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/CS/bitvector32_bitflags.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_BitFlags/VB/bitvector32_bitflags.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用作为章节的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

summary.span: Creates a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

span.span: Creates a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 CreateMask() cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateMask () As Integer

summary.span: Creates the first mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

span.span: Creates the first mask in a series of masks that can be used to retrieve individual bits in a that is set up as bit flags.

returns.span: A mask that isolates the first bit flag in the .

span.span: A mask that isolates the first bit flag in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`CreateMask()`在一系列中创建的第一个掩码和`CreateMask(int)`后面的所有屏蔽。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以创建多个屏蔽来引用相同的位标志。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 生成的掩码隔离中的唯一一位标志。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 你可以组合使用按位或运算创建隔离中的多个位标志的掩码的掩码。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在使用掩码设置为部分可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用掩码。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`CreateMask()`在一系列中创建的第一个掩码和`CreateMask(int)`后面的所有屏蔽。Use `CreateMask()` to create the first mask in a series and `CreateMask(int)` for all subsequent masks. 可以创建多个屏蔽来引用相同的位标志。Multiple masks can be created to refer to the same bit flag. 生成的掩码隔离中的唯一一位标志。The resulting mask isolates only one bit flag in the . 你可以组合使用按位或运算创建隔离中的多个位标志的掩码的掩码。You can combine masks using the bitwise OR operation to create a mask that isolates multiple bit flags in the . 在使用掩码设置为部分可能会导致意外的结果。Using a mask on a that is set up as sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用掩码。The following code example shows how to create and use masks. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CPP/bitvector32_createmasks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/CS/bitvector32_createmasks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32.CreateMasks/VB/bitvector32_createmasks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是一个窗口，到并由组成最少数量的可以包含在指定的最大值的连续位。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，包含的最大值为 1 的部分由组成仅一位，而包含的最大值为 5 的部分组成的三个位数。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建最大值为 1，以充当一个布尔值，从而使您能够将整数和布尔值存储在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 如果部分中已存在，那些章节将仍可访问; 但是，重叠部分可能会导致意外的结果。If sections already exist in the , those sections are still accessible; however, overlapping sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用作为章节的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CPP/bitvector32_sections.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/CS/bitvector32_sections.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.BitVector32_Sections/VB/bitvector32_sections.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是一个窗口，到并由组成最少数量的可以包含在指定的最大值的连续位。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，包含的最大值为 1 的部分由组成仅一位，而包含的最大值为 5 的部分组成的三个位数。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建最大值为 1，以充当一个布尔值，从而使您能够将整数和布尔值存储在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . 如果部分已存在后`previous`中，那些章节将仍可访问; 但是，重叠部分可能会导致意外的结果。If sections already exist after `previous` in the , those sections are still accessible; however, overlapping sections might cause unexpected results. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用作为章节的集合。The following code example uses a as a collection of sections. remarks.format: ## Remarks [节] 属性是索引器作为部分中，设置和[int] 属性是索引器为位标志设置。The [Section] property is the indexer for a that is set up as sections, and the [int] property is the indexer for a that is set up as bit flags. A是一个窗口，到并由组成最少数量的可以包含在指定的最大值的连续位。A is a window into the and is composed of the smallest number of consecutive bits that can contain the maximum value specified in . 例如，包含的最大值为 1 的部分由组成仅一位，而包含的最大值为 5 的部分组成的三个位数。For example, a section with a maximum value of 1 is composed of only one bit, whereas a section with a maximum value of 5 is composed of three bits. 你可以创建最大值为 1，以充当一个布尔值，从而使您能够将整数和布尔值存储在相同。You can create a with a maximum value of 1 to serve as a Boolean, thereby allowing you to store integers and Booleans in the same . C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.

C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;设置属性也是 o （1） 运算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation.
